mapper.sql: id, project_code AS projectCode, address, lng, lat, radius, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser
mapper.select: SELECT pa.id AS id, pa.project_code AS projectCode, pa.address AS address, pa.lng AS lng, pa.lat AS lat, pa.radius AS radius, pa.create_date AS createDate, pa.create_user AS createUser FROM buss_project_address pa LEFT JOIN buss_project_master pm ON pm.project_code = pa.project_code WHERE pa.id > #{id} and pm.contractor_org_code = #{organizationCode} GROUP BY pa.id
